([[Macau]]; April 17, 2004) | World cup apps = 1 | World cup first = 1992 | World cup best = Round 1 ([[1992 FIFA Futsal World Championship|1992]]) | Regional name = [[AFC Futsal Championship]] | Regional cup apps = 5 | Regional cup first = 2003 | Regional cup best = Round 1 ([[2003 AFC Futsal Championship|2003]], [[2004 AFC Futsal Championship|2004]], [[2005 AFC Futsal Championship|2005]], [[2006 AFC Futsal Championship|2006]], [[2007 AFC Futsal Championship|2007]]) }} '''Hong Kong national futsal team''' represents [[Hong Kong]] during international [[futsal]] competitions. It is under the direction of [[The Hong Kong Football Association]] . The national team was first formed in [[1992]] due to [[1992 FIFA Futsal World Championship]] held in Hong Kong. == Latest squad == Squad called up for [[2010 AFC Futsal Championship|2010 AFC Futsal Championship Qualifiers]].
